General.Name: Izmir Firca Sanayi ve Ticaret
General.Description: Izmir Firça Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces and sells various cleaning materials and painting brushes in Turkey and internationally. It offers PET-PVC-PP bristles; building products, such as brushes and roller types; steel products, such as spatula, trowel, and tile comb products; auxiliary materials, including paint mixer, roller sieve, ladder, tarpaulin, and tape products; and cleaning products comprises brush, mop, glass cleaner, floor wiper, pole, cleaning cloth, bucket, etc. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.
